parameters: ZoomIn 2 300
ZoomOut 1 1
FocusCamera event 2 60
ZoomIn 1.2 60
-Doctor Brown-
Ah, Nintai. So you've finally made it.
I'm so glad. We have a lot to discuss.
-Nintai III-
Discuss? Discuss what?
And who are you?
-Doctor Brown-
So sorry. My name is Doctor Charles Brown.
I am a former member of Aldreith's special team who
worked on the development of the Blue Stone.
-Nintai III-
You... you what?
-Doctor Brown-
I know you have a lot of questions.
Don't worry. I can provide answers for each and
every single one of them.
Please, take your time. Ask me whatever you need
to know.
What's the relation between Nintai and Aldreith?
Do you know anything related to the Four Legendary Swords?
I've got nothing to ask right now.
What's the relation between Nintai and Aldreith?
-Nintai III-
I'd like to know more about the Nintai
and Aldreith family relationship.
-Doctor Brown-
The relationship between the two families dates back
to two generations ago, when Nintai I was still alive.
Your grandfather used to be an assassin doing
side contracts, when he stumbled onto this lawless,
savage land.
He decided it needed a ruler. Someone to take the
reigns, and lead whoever was left to save.
You see, even though Nintai was a killer, a man
with blood on his hands, he would only do it for
the sake of good. He never laid hands on the
innocent.
He had no knowledge of how to run a nation, but he
had the guts to try.
No one knows the true meaning as to why he decided
THIS place was going to be saved by him, and no
one knows why he gave up his assassin work after
becoming King, either.
A little after the King was elected, when we'd built
a few sturdy towns and villages, we stumbled across
something extraordinary.
The object that would change the fate of everyone
here: The Blue Stone.
The Stone itself was found sitting in the Flooded
Rockways. One of the miners located it while mining
for minerals.
-Nintai III-
So how was it extracted up to the surface?
The Flooded Rockways is hundreds of
feet underground.
-Doctor Brown-
The miners chipped off the Stone a piece at a time.
Each piece was brought to the surface in mine carts
via a small path that was built to get to the Stone.
Every elemental ornament you pick up has very small
traces of Blue Stone within them. Actually, a lot of
common items have some form of Blue Stone infused into
them.
The Stone itself radiates a magnificent energy, and
it's believed this energy is what has manifested into
potions, bottles, crystals, etc.
The Stone brought prosperity and riches to the land.
It carried an unexplainable power to heal the sick,
bring strength to the weak, and solve all conflicts.
Your grandfather's actions as King, now with the Blue
Stone in his hands, showed the people Nintai I was
the leader among leaders.
At this time, there were no prejudices against
animals ruling as King. Most of the people were
simply at peace to finally have a ruler and leader.
A man by the name of Aldreith was one of the chief
scientists, conducting experiments on the Blue Stone
to determine if it held additional powers we were
currently unaware of.
He proposed a plan to Nintai I to develop an army
of soldiers to keep the kingdom secure from
any external threats.
But he was hiding a lot of the details.
He didn't tell the King he would be using animal
soldiers to raise the army.
Even without knowing this, Nintai outright refused
his idea. The King's land wasn't near enough
major areas to pose a threat to anyone. He believed
an army wasn't necessary.
Aldreith didn't take his refusal very well. As a
proud scientist, he decided he'd raise
his army in secret.
The Blue Stone gave Aldreith terrible ideas of
taking over the King's position by amassing the
army of animal soldiers.
So that's just what he did. Your grandfather fell
shortly afterwards, and Aldreith reigned as King.
ResetFocus 60
ZoomOut 1 100
A
Do you know anything related to the Four Legendary Swords?
-Nintai III-
My father had crafted four swords to wage
a war against Aldreith. Do you know the
details?
-Doctor Brown-
Your father had crafted these swords at different
times in his life.
-Doctor Brown-
The first sword he made was the Greatsword of Nintai.
It is the oldest and weakest of the Four. Do you have
it with you?
-Nintai III-
Yes, it is with me. I had fought a head slime member
to retrieve it.
-Doctor Brown-
Your father's intention was to leave the sword by
your cell, but it had been clearly stolen.
-Nintai III-
That would make a lot of sense.
At some point, your father may have been a part of
the same facility. He left that Legendary Sword beside
your cell so you too, can escape someday.
-Nintai III-
Father...
So he might still be alive?
-Doctor Brown-
Maybe. I can't say for sure.
Now, about the other Swords...
Aldreith commanded his forces to confiscate and hide
your father's Four Legendary Swords in remote
locations.
Those precious swords can put an end to Aldreith's
reign.
Do you have the Greatsword of Wind with you?
-Nintai III-
I acquired it by defeating their
Slime Mother.
-Doctor Brown-
Perfect. You still have two more left.
The next Sword, the Black Flame, is located in the
Fiery Slime tribe temple.
The last Sword, Soothing Water, is located in the
Ghost Tribe Slime temple.
Barging into any den will only welcome trouble. I
suggest you tread carefully through those areas.
Here's the key to the locked door just outside my
building. You'll need it to traverse through Ruby
Forest. But beware, it's filled with Project Haven
failed experiments.
Ruby Forest is also home to animals that were either
too weak to be experimented on, or have escaped.
They have made the forest their home, so be careful.
-Nintai III-
Thank you.
-Doctor Brown-
No worries. Come back to me once you've acquired
the last two swords. I'll find a way to get us to
Aldreith's kingdom.
We have boats docks on either side of the town for
transportation.
ResetFocus 60
ZoomOut 1 100
A
I've got nothing to ask right now.
-Nintai III-
That'll be all for now, Doctor.
-Doctor Brown-
Come back anytime.
ResetFocus 60
ZoomOut 1 100
A
<actionIcon: 28>
